Text: So here it finaly comes, the last release in the Ultimate Edition series!

...all good things come to an end, finaly, lol.

DTSES, thanks for making this UE boxset available. Though I diddnt reply on all torrents from this boxset I asure you I realy appreciate the effort you put into this. I guess I'm not the only one... Big THANK YOU!! U DA MAN!! :)

Now... if anybody is willin' to upload the 2 un-official Bond movies in pref. the same kick-ass quality... would be great to complete.

DTSES, I give you lots of thanks for these big uploads. I can fully understand that it has taken you a lot of time, but I promise you, it was well worth it.

Wellcome back with something similar - if you can find it.
I'm glad for your kind words! Always posetive when someone put a word or 2 that they liked this releases and appriciate the quality that was my number 1 interest.

To be honest, since quality is my main goal I normaly only dl respected group releases these days.

Since I allready 'own' the SE boxset I thought I give this UE boxset a shot.
Quality is top-notch, I was pleasantly suprised!

I'll be on the lookout for future releases from you for sure.

THANKS!
Thanks for all the great 007 movies! i really enjoughed when i watched them! thanks
Yeah, it was a pleasure. Good seedinsped too :)
Why isn't everybody as clever, and quality oriented as you! I love the work you have done, and I am looking forward for further releases from you!!!! Keep on the good work!!!!!! :).
